website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice if you want a nearly professional-grade air bike for your home workouts.
pros: Quality construction makes the bike durable and sturdy
Customers love the simplistic, yet comprehensive, design of the display
Bike allows owners to customize their workouts and intervals
cons: Some buyers had issues with shipping

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have ever made. Probably the worst piece of exercise equipment ever created. Just got done doing sprints on it and I am dead in less than ten minutes. Not many excuses you can make for not setting aside a quick ten minutes. If your someone like me who struggles with sticking to a routine get this and start everyday with motivational videos on YouTube. Don't commit to working out everyday but commit to watching or listening to motivational content everyday and chances are you'll work out as a result. (Or get other important things you need to do done)
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the assault bike but one of the pedals broke directly off after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this bike was defective out of the box. The fan cage bars were bent, the fan was wobbly, and the console mount was mangled leaving it impossible to bolt down or secure the instrument cluster. Amazon customer service has been great, though. I’m grateful for their willingness to replace this bike as well as send someone over to repackage the defective one and haul it away. If the next bike proves to be solid and without damage then I may update this rating, but as of now it’s quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Allegedly commercial grade product broke in under thirty seconds
customer_reviews.text: Get this assembled relatively easily. Started using it and less than thirty seconds in one of the chains snaps. They are sending me a new chain but I'm on my own to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Max Friel

customer_reviews.title: Multiple faulty chains  and bad costumer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought five bikes. Within the first minute a chain on one broke. They sent us a new chain but zero instructions on how to put it on. Then literally 20 mins after getting off the phone with an uncooperative customer service rep the chain on a second bike broke. It was the very next serial number in order so it must have been a factory issue. Got back on with costumer service who basically told me to just deal with it and refused to let me speak with a supervisor. Had to waist a ton of time and pay someone to fix them. I Should have spent the extra $50 and gone with a Rogue I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Alex gunoe

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this bike because it is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this bike because it is very sturdy. And if you are a big guy or big woman. You can ride this bike and rest assured. That it will hold you stable without fear of collapsing or falling. I am round 385 390 . It holds me without me wobbling. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: gorgihow2000

customer_reviews.title: Assault bike it is!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard some great reviews of this, being well built - and up to 400 pound riders. I saw videos of big firefighters in full gear doing intervals. Then I checked their website, and chatted with their customer rep - instantly. While it's the same price at their website, the shipping is much much slower. So they agreed - Amazon is the place to buy it. Great build! It kicks my butt! Such a workout machine. Love it. Wish I would have found it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: bluedot

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike while deployed to the Middle East (the price dropped), my wife assembled it for me; I got home a month later and the first five seconds I used it the chain broke... and now I’m outside of the “return” window. I recommend buying a different bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my garage gym. Recovering from a shoulder injury so no sense spending $$ on a gym membership. Easy to assemble and will make you sweat. Purchased it on the payment plan which makes it more affordable. I'd definitely recommend whether you go to a globo gym or crossfit box. There are just some days you don't want to leave the house but can still get in a good workout by walking 20 or so feet to your garage or exercise room.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box, perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Box was pretty banged up but the bike was fine. Assembly was easy as long as you follow the instructions. Just lay everything out and you can assemble on under 30 min. The bike itself is sturdy and is a great reminder of how out of shape you are. It can make a lot of noise, it is not bad unless you are in a room with other people, my wife hasn't been bothered when I'm in a different room. The bike allows you to do either just legs or just arms if you don't want to do both at the same time. Display is easy to read and use.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I went between this model and another really heavy duty one at twice the cost. Package came undamaged with all the parts. Packed really well. Almost threw out the pedals as they were packed in the large styrofoam block. My only complaint is the seat is really hard unless you are a long distance biker who is used to that type of seat. Looks like it takes any typical bike seat, but not a banana seat. I like the options to choose from and the ability to create your own program. One of my favorite things about the machine is the fan blows air on you so you keep cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Carl P

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied- great bike for fitness and workout
customer_reviews.text: I Love this bike it is everything I had hoped. It is an airdyne bike so makes noise but they all do. We’ve had it about a month and it’s so nice after a long day to climb on and wear off some tension! The settings are easy to use and you have a variety of settings to choose from. We had an Amazon contractor come in to assemble it- only took about 45 minutes. She took the time to explain a few things to me before she left and did a really great job! I am very happy with this investment in my health and well being!
customer_reviews.author: churchlady

customer_reviews.title: Top 10 best buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. I've only had it for a week but here's my initial impressions: 1) Ordered through Amazon at a great price 2) Arrived on time as scheduled 3) I watched a video from the manufacturer and put it together in about 30 minutes (about) 4) It's now my morning thing to do. I'm up about 6 and start with an easy 10 minutes then IT'S ON. I have a bedroom ( actually my cat's bedroom ) with the bike and a TV. I can watch CNBC and get work out. Noise level is acceptable for me, comfort is good. Workout is my choice. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PompanoJoe

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten one of these as my first bike
customer_reviews.text: Far and away higher quality than any other standing bike I've used. Awesome for HIIT and, via the mets measurement, possible to compare progress workout to workout. I use mine in the garage and after 6 months have had no issues in winter (-10 F) or summer (humid 95F). Seat adjusts for everyone from my daughter (4' 6") to me (6' 1"). I especially like the fact that, even if the electronics do fail some day (seems to be the inevitable point of failure on cardio exercise equipment), the bike is still just as useful exercise wise, it just won't be able to gather metrics. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kaul

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tighten one of the handles and every few minutes you need to re-tighten it because it comes loose with use. It’s okay for interval training but I can’t see myself using it longer than 10 mins at a time. Definitely feels like it was overpriced and would return if we could.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M.

customer_reviews.title: What's NOT to love?!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite pieces of gear for my crossfit workouts @home. Loved the assault bike when using AT the gym, now the same one @home!!! Felt very lucky that I found it IN STOCK when I did. I use this in around 2 or more of my 5 WODs per week and it NEVER fails to challenge me. Strong, sturdy, highly adjustable, and easy to use. HIGHEST recommendation to any user (novice-expert).
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy if you are lazy. This bike will kick your ass. I get winded after 10 cal which is about 7 seconds and I can run 3 miles like nothing before break of day. Dont waste your money on the wind guard, it's really unnecessary. Easy to assemble. Easy to set up monitor. I love it. Just be prepared to be exhausted.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Jack Funk

customer_reviews.title: No problems for 2+ years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bike for over 2 years and never have had to worry if it will work or not. It’s a work horse. I use the built in interval timer for a quick workout that I know will leave me huffing and puffing. I also use the bike for one hour medium paced rides to build up my stamina and knee strength. For the long rides I usually put my phone on the ledge of the display screen. It is noisy but I usually use headphones to drowned out the noise.
customer_reviews.author: DadAzon

customer_reviews.title: A great piece of equipment for this old man who needed exercise.
customer_reviews.text: The airbike was easy to assemble. It takes less space than my old treadmill and gives me the workout I was desperately needing. I am on it several times a day and am feeling positive results. I couldn't use the treadmill anymore because of a bad foot so this allows me to get exercise that I really needed. I am 85 years old and really enjoying this piece of equipment. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Neil R.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible machine! Incredible workout!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to workout your quads and lower half of your body, there is no better work/time ratio. You cannot beat this combo in the least amount of time. This isn't your take a stroll and jog type of workout. HIIT is where it's at. Short spurts of intense activity and you will feel it in your legs. Every time I get off of this bike, my legs are done. Like jelly-like. Helluva workout!
customer_reviews.author: flymau5

customer_reviews.title: bane of my existance
customer_reviews.text: This bike hurts. This bike makes me angry. it kills my legs and arms. it makes me drip sweat. it is everything you hate in a workout. WHich is why its literally one of the best pieces of work out equipment on the planet. Its durable, easy to set up and will have you wondering why you make yourself suffer so much in minutes. 10/10 product. 10/10 comfort. i prefer this over the assault bike pro. this one feels more ergonomic. buy this bike, suffer, for the greater good. you wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: grizzzzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Assault Air bike
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at a reasonable price. Easy to adjust the seat either higher or lower. Electronics are easy to use to set programs and you can set your own pace. Burns calories like crazy!! After recent foot surgery, this was a great bike to get back in shape since I could use the upper body portion of the bike until I could pedal. This way, I still was able to get a good workout in.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable to ride. Handles come back to far ...
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable to ride. Handles come back to far makes it really hard to get on and off. I regret buying it. Would give it no stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for several months. After knee and hip replacements ( on opposite sides), I could no longer ride my bike on the street. I can ride this and get a much better workout actually. It’s easy on knees and hips. Younger people can REALLY get an outstanding workout. It doesn’t have all the bells and whistles but it does have basic time, calories, distance etc. All I need.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Rattling sound
customer_reviews.text: Bike makes a rattling sound when in use, although seems to be functioning properly. Not sure what maintenance is needed to correct the noise. I'm guessing the chain needs oil or tightening. I sent a request for product support to the manufacturer detailing the issue through Amazon's product/order page. Have not received a response as of yet. The bike appears to have been purchased before and returned (looks like it was repackaged), so I don't know if prior purchaser had unresolved issues. Not sure at this point if I will keep or return to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Sketl

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: This bike gets my heart rate up in just 20 seconds. It's hard to do but you feel great after you do some interval training. It can be loud so we placed it in our small balcony and it fit. We don't use it at unreasonable hours so that neighbors don't complain. It's easy to assemble just follow the instructions. Most of the bike is already assembled for you.
customer_reviews.author: Andersson

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: Compared to all the other the plastic covered Air bikes, this Air Bike is the best I found after researching for the past two months. Very well built, sturdy, and no squeaks or radeling. It has metal components throughout with quality parts. I can ride it and still hear my TV without turning up the volume. Fantastic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brannamsc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition for my garage gym! Torn between this and a rower (from CrossFit past experiences) and finally made the leap here. Way more enjoyable than running in my opinion. Full body workout? Sure is! Kicks my ass every time. As expected. Short workouts and lots of burned calories. Easy to assembly. I use 3-4 days a week and building up the endurance. Prepare to sweat and work those lungs.
customer_reviews.author: gocavman

customer_reviews.title: Best machine to hate
customer_reviews.text: Boy, I hate this thing. It works so good. I'm concerned about my heart so I'm using it for interval training and it's not easy. I think it's the best machine for the money. You won't enjoy it but it will make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: It's not the Rogue Bike
customer_reviews.text: It must have been dropped during delivery. The fan wheel and cage were completely destroyed. It's a huge pain to return something this big and heavy. Hopefully ups doesn't f-up the next one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best cardio you can get!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It’s really a great way to get your cardio in. I’m in relatively good shape and it seriously kicked my butt. You get a good full body workout from it because you’re not only pedaling but you’re pushing and pulling with your upper body. I’m also 6’3” and I had no problems with it being short. The height adjustments worked for me. The build of it is also super solid. It’s all metal and heavy. No matter how hard I push it this bike stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony O.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I dont have the best knees so running isnt for me. This bike is a brutal workout. 3min sprints with full body work. In a month in a half ive lost 20lbs. Couldn't be happier. Great purchase for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment for HIIT CARDIO
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Assault Airbike for my wife to workout in garbage. She loves it! I found myself using it as well. We both enjoy do cardio HIIT on the bike. It was very easy to assemble. It is also very sturdy, durable and it can stand up to the intense pulling and pedaling when doing HIIT cardio. Her sister and mom tried the bike and her sister plans on buy one. I highly recommend this bike if you are in the market for an airbike.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Soul crusher
customer_reviews.text: This will crush your soul. But excellent piece of exercise equipment
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Krivacek

customer_reviews.title: Quality product easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months the left pedal stripped out. We emailed the company and had to go through hoops of cideos and photos and receipts, to prove we needed a new pedal. Did that in one day and it took 9 days to get the $16 parts at no cost-They did not expedite and took that long to get from San Diego to Sacramento- should have taken 2 days. SLOW customer service after spending so much.....and we missed days of workouts. Not sure it’s a quality product- to be determined
customer_reviews.author: Laura V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the video and assembled it in less than an hour, very straight forward. I'm very satisfied with my purchase and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: K. Markovich

customer_reviews.title: Kicks my ass!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeballing this bike for several months and finally pulled the trigger to buy. A few weeks in and I absolutely love using it as an addition to my workouts, or giving my knees a break from running. You can customize any program you'd like to do, but the preset intervals do plenty to make my heart feel like it's going to explode out of my chest. I'm 6'2, 210 and the only suggestion I'd have would be to allow the seat to slide back just a bit further for taller riders. Overall sturdiness is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: absosutly love this machine -best on matket! use it daily it will kick your @ss and you will lose weight when combined with proper diet. We caught it on-sale @ $599. watch for sales on this wonderful bike and add it to your goto cardio workhorse. -WOuld buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Sony_XLTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: It's loud!!
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a CrossFit standard but that is where it belongs in a garage or a wharehouse. The chain driven system is very loud. Too loud for an apartment. The handles are also pretty wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will beat you down if you underestimate this piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: The item is exactly as described. My friends have one so I knew what I was getting myself into. I chose this over the belt driven ones as I like the idea of a chain over a belt. It is loud but it is also an AirBike and it isn't supposed to be quiet. It did come in a box and only took me a few minutes to assemble by myself. Works like I was hoping for and I really like being on it when I can't ride my bicycle outdoors. Fast shipping for such a large box also.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoying the ride

customer_reviews.title: Work every single penny!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike! I owned a gym and had a few of these and they work very well for anything you need. From a warm up to a full workout. Even some rehab if needed. Don’t waste any more time and get this!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Best bike on the market! CrossFit community #1 choice! This bike is made to take a beating and it kicks your a$$
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Decent fitness equipment
customer_reviews.text: Solid and cost efficient fitness equipment. Less pressure on ur joints and high intensity cardio machine
customer_reviews.author: Jinyoung Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Man does this thing work! Solid construction, good starting resistance and the rate that it increases resistance, phenomenal! I can see why so many cross fitters use it!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy2222

customer_reviews.title: Assault AirBike Classic, Black
customer_reviews.text: I love to 2 way seat. It is a huge improvement over all other far more expensive bikes that don't feature this. Very sturdy and easily movable. I use it a lot on leg days with my Clients to do super sets and also as a warm up or a cool down. Highly recommend Dr. Raven Flores Ph.D Kinesiology
customer_reviews.author: Body by Raven

customer_reviews.title: it is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A solid piece of exercise equipment. Easy to assemble. Easy to adjust for different users. Computer screen is hard to read in low light. Seat takes some adjustment to get comfortable. Overall, the product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mead

customer_reviews.title: Great air bike at a great price
customer_reviews.text: After reading an extensive review on the two top selling air bikes, I chose this one because of my height and a few other features. It came well packaged, it was easy to assemble and even came with the necessary tools to do it. I have had it over a month now and use it almost daily. It is sturdy and should last for many years!
customer_reviews.author: James Urquidez

customer_reviews.title: Well worth torture machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing will break you and by break you, I mean it will break your soul and body. I got on this bike thinking it was going to be easy and not really give me a workout. I was WRONG! It gave me a workout that I wasn’t expecting and it’s well worth it! It was easy to put together and even has wheels in the front to lift and move easily. It is also a way to get in a quick workout since you can hop on it and get going.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Feels rock solid. First program button is tabata 20 10 which is what I use most
customer_reviews.author: Peter Romine

customer_reviews.title: The Beast!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and boy does this machine live up to its reputation. It is solid, and by that I mean built like a tank. The quality is superb, and yes, it gives you as much as you put in. For the money one of the best air bikes on the market.
customer_reviews.author: RTinVA

customer_reviews.title: Deadly... good for you.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in a little spot in my garage. The assault bike is dangerously good for exercise. If you ever did a CrossFit workout with it, it’s literally hell. We do 100-200 calories on the hike as warm up. Runs smoothly. So far works well!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Koyama

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard all the hype about interval training with this bike, so I got one and decided to try it. If you truly go all on this bike then it will destroy you,mm which is exactly what you want in interval training. It is very solid, sturdy, and we'll built. The seat isn't the most comfortable thing ever, but it isn't any worse than your typical seat bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: A great buy at the price. Sturdy, durable, and comes together easily (hour or so of assembly).
customer_reviews.text: The Assault Fitness Airbike is by-far one of the best buys I have made. It's heavy duty. Assembly is very straight forward... almost don't need the instruction sheet. Necessary tools are provided. Great price, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike, even better workout!
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty club style bike. Very heavy and sturdy, easy to assemble Though. The burn is awesome! Best bike I’ve ever owned and I’ve had 3 or 4. Wasn’t sure if I should spend the extra $ but I’m glad I did. I would recommend this bike 100%
customer_reviews.author: George J

customer_reviews.title: Cardio monster!
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it claims to do. Smokes your cardio in a VERY short time! Setting it to interval training I can only get through four cycles (about 14 minutes) before I am absolutely gasping for breath. I am also really happy with how sturdy the quality of this bike is. I'm a big guy and bikes made out of plastic and pot metal get wrecked pretty quickly by me, the Assault just shrugs me off like a big horse would.
customer_reviews.author: HDelta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Value.
customer_reviews.text: It took me longer to open the box, throw out the styrofoam and cut the tape off of the pedals than it did to assemble the bike. Same exact quality of bike I have used in numerous boxes and military gyms. I ordered Thursday morning at 630 am and received it Friday at 230 in the afternoon. 5 interest free payments of 140 or so dollars. Best value I have ever purchased off of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Scola

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth if your looking for a good workout.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for either a good cardio or a but kicking workout this Assault bike will give both. It definitely gets the job done and you don’t need to be a gym freak to get going. Has several options for training and getting you started to work your cardio up little by little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike. I use it daily as either a warm up before I workout or for a full cardio workout. Very solid, stable. Only drawback might be that it is a little loud, but I have it located on the other side of my house so I don't wake anyone at 4AM with the TV turned up to hear over the bike. Assembly was easy. I'm glad I didn't pay extra to have anyone do it for me. Video was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! The best cardio equipment I’ve ever used. Great value. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Air bike
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike! It truly delivers. Easy assembly , nice addition to my he living/ TV room. I only wish there was a hood attached to the front to keep the strong air/wind from blowing in the face.
customer_reviews.author: S. Santini

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bike! I was introduced to these participating in crossfit and wanted one for the house. Amazon offering payment plans sealed the deal and made it a no brainer. Easy to assemble, pretty intuitively packaged to make assembly that much easier, and sturdy as they come. This is the gift that keeps on giving and will keep your butt kicked if you put in the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Devils Tricycle
customer_reviews.text: This bike hates me...and I hate it....But I feel amazing after using it. I will do 500 calorie workouts, intervals or just total calories at a decent pace. I'm always winded after. I would recommend this bike to anyone that likes their butt kicked during a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Well built air bike!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the assault air bike classic and it took 20 minutes to put together. Once completed, I got on it and did 30 seconds and about died. Great workout!! I’m 5’8” and 200lbs and the bike didn’t wobble once. The resistance is outstanding!! Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Rattle Rattle clank buzz.  This thing sounds CHEAP, not what I expected for the price and reviews
customer_reviews.text: The bike works but the rattling, grinding and clanking noises are actually embarrassing. I just spent $800 for an excercise bile with $200 quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and expected. Super easy to assemble. YouTube videos walk you through it perfectly. Monitor quit working......couldn’t see anything......turned dim/faint. Contacted the manufacturer and they sent me a new working monitor and it works great. This bike kicks your butt. Best piece of exercise equipment I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch J

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Best air bike built for under a thousand dollars have used it almost everyday since received and works as it should. It was easy to assemble and I can relocate the bike with ease.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth e. gordon

customer_reviews.title: It’s gooood
customer_reviews.text: Set up took 45-60 mins. Very straightforward. Packaged well. Used it for 5 minutes, 20 seconds high intensity, 40 seconds recovery, rinse and repeat. My goodness I’m in worse shape than I thought. Almost tossed my cookies. Great machine. Hopefully I can shed some lbs and up my intensity and time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: If You Have Short Arms, Not For You......
customer_reviews.text: Could not use this bike. Arms are not adjustable and I could not reach them -- too far away. At 77 years of age, I also was worried about falling off the bike seat and getting injured. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: NinthWard

customer_reviews.title: The breeze from the airbike is excellent
customer_reviews.text: The airbike is a quality item. I read the other reviews about the seat being uncomfortable and bought a large gel seat that makes it very comfortable. I enjoy riding it. There was nothing to setup with the monitoring - I just took the default settings and it starts right up when I start pedaling.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bieltz

customer_reviews.title: This is the Airbike to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Airbike to purchase! It was a bit pricey for my wallet, but now I'm so happy I took a leap of faith and broke the bank. I'm delighted with it, and I reccomend this Airbike.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Carbonaro

customer_reviews.title: High quality machine
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, all of the tools you need are in the box. I had an issue with one of the bolt holes being stripped, I called the manufacturer and they directed me back to Amazon. They have me some options and I didn't want to wait for a new one so I got the discount. Amazon was very helpful. The bike feels very sturdy and smooth. It does kick up a good breeze but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: S. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Spend the difference for the Schwinn Airdyne pro
customer_reviews.text: Price is fair, beware! It’s new but 2016 model. Seats sucks, Will need to upgrade. Upgrade pedals so your shoes stay in place. Some assembly hardware missing from package. Loud!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth carter

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Had some trouble with parts after some use. But Assault Fitness was great and got me new parts under the warranty. Totally worth it for this machine that is awesome and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Tern

customer_reviews.title: Must have for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Best addition to my home gym, vs running. Combines high intensity interval training with multiple muscle groups, legs, chest, arms, back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crank shaft not properly machined
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use the bike because I spent 2 hours trying to get an poorly machined crank shaft to allow the pedal to screw into it. Pedal was able to screw in from the back side as a test but would not go in properly from the front. WASTE OF MY TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Irish

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not a Rogue Echo
customer_reviews.text: Considering how similarly priced this is to a Rogue Echo, I can not recommend this. It feels like a toy compared to the Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect from home CrossFit gym
customer_reviews.text: Got this since I’m not going to a CrossFit affiliate. It’s newer than the version at the gyms I used to go to. Hubby put it together easily.
customer_reviews.author: Whitty Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fortunate to have this at home.
customer_reviews.text: Easily to assemble. Packaged and delivered perfectly. No complaints. A little cardio during these COVID times.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy and well built product. Recommend to anyone looking for a High quality bike. The only downside to this bike is the seat is not comfortable making it tough for longer workouts
customer_reviews.author: Matt Williams

customer_reviews.title: It is so mean.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy, it is a toy built by the devil. The harder you push it the meaner it is to you. You try to caress it and be sweet... then it takes advantage of you and you want to prove yourself. Gasping for breath, wishing you could return it, thinking I’m going to do better next time. Just like when you pooped your cherry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice bike for a good price. Its been a great addition to the home gym, have used it almost daily
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Put together in 30 min, super easy. And it’s well put together, in my opinion the best workout you can get with low impact too
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Where do i start, i absolutely love love love this bike. Love it so much i talk about it and 5 of my friends also boutght it ( your welcome)
customer_reviews.author: Maria Anibal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a ridiculously Strong bike very very sturdy if I could give it more than five stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I ever did. I run do a WOD then do the bike. Brings a whole different element to your work out
customer_reviews.author: Henry Martinezandino

customer_reviews.title: The best workout you can get
customer_reviews.text: I love my assault bike!! I have a home gym and this fits perfectly around the other equipment. I didn’t take kind to put it together. I did it by myself in about and hour. It doesn’t squeak the only sound you hear is the fan. This give a feat workout and I’m glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flames

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy build and arrived super quick especially during the pandemic
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy to put together, and is a sturdy piece of equipment. Don't think you can go wrong with this, especially if you're on the bigger end of people.
customer_reviews.author: George L Royer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, no customer service from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. Sturdy enough for powerlifting types, good for a serious workout. Emailed manufacturer through their website with a troubleshooting question but they never responded -- eventually figured it out for myself! So all in all a great machine but don't expect customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D

customer_reviews.title: Great investment...Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to the home gym. Great low impact/conditioning option. You get out what you put in with this thing, regardless of your fitness level. Second only to my concept2 rower when it comes to making me feel like I'm going to die. Seems pretty durable. It's heavy but it's fairly easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Arias

customer_reviews.title: Great for a burn!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bike at my gym but wanted something I can use at home that gave me the push I never got from other stationary bikes. Totally worth the purchase. My initial bike had a cut wire but Amazon customer service helped to get me a replacement quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Kicks your butt
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Heavy though! Can always rely on this bike to get a great workout in a short amount of time. Really happy with my decision to trade my spin bike for the air assault bike. Assault bike is also easier on my beleaguered back.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and a great workout. This really gets your heart rate up. Perfect for working on endurance
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: My best peice of gear for doing proper Tabatas
customer_reviews.text: My best peice of gear for doing proper Tabatas. Easy to put together and the thing I love to hate in my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: It seems a bit more sturdy than my 25 year old Air Dyne
customer_reviews.text: It seems a bit more sturdy than my 25 year old Air Dyne. The work out is more effective but my old bike was 25 and probably a bit worn. But as many have remarked the seat is awful. It seem to have been designed for a 30 year old cross training proctologist. I had already purchased a replacement before the bike arrived. One thing that the Air Dyne had which the Assault does not was a screw down brake that immobilized the fly wheel. That was a good safety device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Display Malfunctioned Within Months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike Sept 19. A few months ago, I noticed the display beginning to lighten. April 2029, It’s now blank. I’ve changed out the batteries multiple times. Nothing works. Very frustration considering the bike is virtually brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very solid exercise equipment and it offers great resistance. very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding exercise bike!
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction and an excellent value. I am using it for physical therapy and cardio fitness and could not be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Scared me with their changed photo of product for april fools day but other than that an excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas F.

customer_reviews.title: Same assault bike I’ve used in the gym
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike - it’s the perfect torture device. It was easy to assemble and works great - exactly what I was expecting, having used it in the gym prior to purchasing one for the house
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

product_meta.title: Assault AirBike Classic, Black
product_meta.description: The all NEW Assault Air Bike is a modernly designed take on a very old traditional air resistance bike. Fixing everything that was wrong and implementing new technology. Strengthening all pivot points and upgrading them with bearings instead of bushings to provide a powerfully smooth operation. Work out with no limits due to the unlimited resistance provided by air. Power your legs and arms faster or slower to determine your resistance. Monitor time, distance, calories, watts, RPMs, speed with the on board smart computer console. Includes Motivating programs, like Tabata Intervals, which help build up strength and stamina or choose the Heart Rate monitoring program to monitor your pulse and build up your aerobic base. All this is wrapped up in a frame that can take the abuse and dish it out too. Product Dimension: 59.95 L X 23.34 W X 50 H Inches
feature_bullets: Twenty Sealed Ball Bearings throughout the frame and pivot points to provide a smooth and durable feel
Unlimited Resistance for upper and lower body extremities based on Air Resistance; Get a complete Cross-Fit Workout
Computer features motivational programs providing many programs (Tabata, Intervals, Watts, Heart Rate) to accomplish your fitness goals.Aluminum seat post
Maximum user weight: 350 pounds . Twenty Five inch diameter steel fan delivers maximum resistance, with six way adjustable seat fore and aft, up and down and tilt. Square-tapered design
Set a calorie, distance, or time target goal with the advanced computer display ; Integrated messaging to help inspire you keeps the workout fresh

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
